meaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> is the <radical>same</radical> as your <kanji>torso</kanji>. You must have a really huge torso for it to be the same as the moon.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>torso</kanji> got so big because of all the <reading>dough</reading>nuts (どう) you ate. You ate so many doughnuts that your torso got to be the size of the moon and then you floated away into space with your own gravitational pull and everything. Doughnuts are dangerous things.
